title: Jax Jungle Help
body:
Been having huge problems balancing farm and ganking without falling massively behind in cs and pressuring the map. 
I believe this is due to all the xp jungle camp nerfs in the jungle. 
I feel i just don't have the freedom i used to have in the jungle. 

To all Jungle mains especially if you play Jax. 
What are you building?
What camp routes are you taking?
Any tips would be good?
